text: Though they may gather some Left-wing support, a large majority of Labour M Ps are likely to turn down the Foot-Griffiths resolution. Mr. Foot's line will be that as they should not now put forward nominees. He believes that the House of Lords should be abolished and that Labour should not take any steps which would appear to prop up an out-dated institution.
handwritten_text: Though they may gather some Left-wing support, a large majority of Labour M Ps are likely to turn down the Foot-Griffiths resolution. Mr. Foot's line will be that as they should not now put forward nominees. He believes that the House of Lords should be abolished and that Labour should not take any steps which would appear to prop up an out-dated institution.
